name: Cloud Commerce
tag_list: cloud-computing, netsuite, cloud-erp, cloud-crm, hosted-pbx, what-is-cloud-computing
description: Cloud Products and Services for SMBs.
overview:
Cloud Computing products and solutions for business like Hosted ERP and CRM, Hosted PBX, Hosted Exchange, Document Management.

Cloud Commerce is committed to serving the IT and Application needs of small and mid-sized businesses. Our unique focus on cloud computing allows us to specialize in providing comprehensive best of breed cloud computing products and services, with unbeatable services and support, so that our customers can save money on technology and focus on growing their business. We realize the economy is currently very difficult, but we believe we are in a unique position, more than ever, to add value to companies by helping them realize the benefits of technology with reasonable cost.
